content: Investigational biosimilar SB-341 showed promising Phase 2 results for refractory spondyloarthritis. Study participants at Sunset Hills Regional received biweekly infusions with 73% showing 50% pain reduction. Lead researcher Dr. Elaine Martinson presented findings via PX203 encrypted teleconference on 12/05/2023. Next-phase enrollment requires documented TNF inhibitor failure.
